Methods and tools for librarians

Managing the publication explosion

How can you effectively teach information literacy skills to your students amidst rapid growth of published research? Download our latest white paper today.

What you'll take away from this paper

Practical ways to help you and your students manage the rapid growth of published search.
Tips for sistematically screening the literature, approaching the full text and following the citation trail.
Latest tools and technologies to help you improve the research skills of your students and researchers.

Emma Warren-Jones

COO Scholarcy

Today, a big challenge for Librarians is helping their students navigate the ever-expanding pool of research to find the information that will be most useful to them – a task that’s demanding ever more sophisticated research tools and methods.
We are a London-based Edtech applying machine learning to extract structured data and knowledge summaries from scholarly content.
